text: Woman: What do you want? Are you gonna make yourself useful or not?
You: Hold on, hold on. Did you see a little boy come in here? He was just with me.
Woman: A little boy? What little boy? Tell me! Tell me! What did he look like?
You: [You describe the boy you just saw]
Woman: You saw him. He’s- he’s really here.
You: Yes. You know him? He didn’t seem like he had met anyone else in this place besides me.
Woman: I knew him before this place, fool. Get to work. We need to get out of here.
